channel.title: Noderr Protocol Updates
channel.description: Latest updates from Noderr Protocol - Institutional-grade DeFi infrastructure with evolutionary AI trading

item.title: Welcome to Noderr Protocol
item.description: Introducing institutional-grade DeFi infrastructure powered by evolutionary AI trading and Pyth Network oracles. Learn how Noderr delivers sustainable 8-28% APY with zero inflation.
item.dc:creator: Noderr Protocol Team

item.title: Testnet Launch on Base Sepolia
item.description: Noderr Protocol testnet is now live on Base Sepolia. Join our community to test node operations, governance, and earn testnet rewards. Free faucet tokens available for all tiers.
item.dc:creator: Noderr Protocol Team

item.title: Pyth Network Integration: Enterprise-Grade Oracle Solution
item.description: Discover how Noderr Protocol leverages Pyth Network for real-time, high-fidelity price feeds. Learn about sub-second updates, cryptographic signatures, and institutional-grade price discovery.
item.dc:creator: Noderr Protocol Team
